valueProp: Meza Law is a certified minority-owned law firm. Ricardo Meza served more than ten years as a federal prosecutor in the Northern District of Illinois and the Western District of Texas and was Illinois’ former Executive Inspector General. He has substantial trial experience having tried over 33 federal jury trials. Celia Meza is the former City of Chicago Corporation Counsel where she led and managed the legal department for the 3rd largest city in the U.S. and oversaw all litigation, torts, contracts, real estate, commercial transactions, and enforcement. Celia is also a former federal prosecutor and is an expert on labor, employment and compliance matters.
